documents.document: Certainly wish turon all the best and as a say he gave 100%, could see him playing top line EPL if he wanted to stay UK next season.

@thebeerjedi they do! N no probs
Martin as always was constant threat for cardiff, guy is class player. Ulmer has decent game tae. Bowns solid!!
That Paquet/wando line has been brilliant recently and it was great to see wando get a beauty of a goal n philly mom! Kudos to them both! ðŸ‘
Cardiff are very gd team and they kept things simple. Flyers very poor PP cost them tonight. Battled hard but u gotta take yer chances!!
Cardiff mom- martin!!
Ma mom picks would paquet or wando. N bowns or martin
Cardiff win 1-2!!
Back underway! 54seconds to play. Faceoff devils zone. Owen pulled.
Whistle goes as guy lies on the puck. Flyers call timeout. 54seconds to play
Owen pulled...
Glove save bowns. 3.37 to play. Still 1-2 cardiff lead
Flyers FS 3.58 to play
Cardiff FS n on PP for 51seconds
Sisca finishes couple of hits
Paquet gets called for interferance. 4on4.
Cardiff 4skaters
Haines shot is blocked n cleard
Batch sits 2 roughin. 5on3 for flyers!!
Sisca is clattered into the boards by batch, size differance but that didnt look nice. Hes up n ok
Brooksy gettin seen to by the doctor on the bench
Puck hits brooks right in the puss he goes down. Halas allows play to go on.
Open net fox its the crossbar
Scott hotham btw thats takin the pens
PP flyers! Hotham with another stupid pen. Interferance this time. Come on fife.
Icing faceoff cardiff zone
Sisca slapshot is held!! That goal has got the crowd goin. 10.11 to play
Wando bloody deserves that goal hes been superb recently! Blocks shot in own zone flyers go forward puck comes back to him n boom top shelf!
GOAL FLYERS!!! WANDO!!! You beauty!! 1-2!!
Gd block from wando
Cardiff go close with ulmer shot nice pad save then rebound gets put just wide
Flyers offside. 12.38 to play. Cardiff leadin 0-2!
Paquet slapshot takes a tip bowns has it... whistle goes just as it does puck rolls out behind him, cardiff back to FS
Save bowns, rebound glove save. 41seconds left on flyers pp
Thinel weak shot pad save
PP flyers! Ulmer 2roughin
Glove save bowns. Haines n ulmer have bit shove at eachother.
Sorry both crosscheckin no roughin
Hotham and fox sit 2roughin each. Hotham was gettin intial call then fox got sent tae 4on4 hockey
Lord wristshot glove save owen
Stray pass from moyer. Icing!
Brooks throws it towards net bowns covers
Cardiff pressure as fife cant clear puck falls to piggott shoots high
Save owen!! Batch holdin issacs leg there no call
Moyer to schaber into zone with speed wristshot stick save bowns
@FifeFreePressEd @colingourlay84 piss poor atmosphere all season!!
Flyers not taking there chances on the PP!!
End of the 2nd cardiff lead 0-2!!
Huge double save bowns. Cardiff back to 4skaters. Then another save from bowns to deny thinel at the back door
5on3 for flyers! Hotham takes a stupid slashin pen. Got to take this chance.
Cardiff clear zone n get a change
PP flyers! Bordulaeu sits
Cardiff in flyers zone passing it around shot comes off brooks stick n goes high
Cardiff offside. Theres not happy wi tht call
Gd shift from wando
Mistake from louis in cardiff zone he gets away with it as flyers make a blind pass to no fucker
Fox slapshot held by bowns. 7.14 to go in 2nd.
Cardiff back to FS...
Paquet throws it across crease comes off a cardiff leg bowns dives on the loose puck
Jackman slapshot thro traffic bowns gets enough on it to see it wide
PP flyers! Fournier sits delay of game
Puck goes up n out of play. Faceoff flyers zone. 9.25 to go in 2nd cardiff leaden 0-2
Big chanc for cardiff as they break they shoot wide
Thinel one on one tries to go 5hole bowns saves!
Gd pad save owen to deny piggott
Muir gettin a shift
Puck comes off camersons stick n goes out of play. Gd shift from that line tryin to create
Sisca slapshot glove save bowns.
Flyers back to FS
Loose puck owen covers! Handbags wi paquet n myres
Hotham slapshot held by owen, 57seconds left on cardiff pp
Pp devils!! Hainsey 2boardin
Icing faceoff cardiff zone
Martin was the scorer
Goal cardiff! SH complete fuck up by owen n dman at side of the net 0-2
Fox to schaber shot goes wide
2nd period underway! Cardiff lead 0-1. Flyers on pp for 1.53
Pritty even game! Cardiff taking there chance on the PP!
End of the 1st cardiff lead 0-1!
And gets done for trippin at the other end! PP flyers!
Myres seems to hurt himsel bit in tht faceoff, carrys on tho
Issacs into the zone wristshot glove save! 21seconds to go in 1st
Schaber chance in front shoots wide
Cameron shot pad save
Great grafting shift from paquet
Icing faceoff cardiff zone. 4.14 to go in 1st cardiff lead 0-1
Finucci one wraparound saved! Rebound paquets in there back to net shoots pad save n cardiff clear tht was close to flyers opener
Sisca brooks link up sisca cant get to brooks pass gd work from dman puttin pressure on.
Nets come off as shot was taken, gd goal. Was in either way imo.
Goal cardiff!! PPG!! 0-1 benti
